root.name: Harley Pasternak's Hollywood Workout
root.description: OverviewHarley Pasternak's Hollywood Workout is a fitness game developed by Heavy Iron Studios and published by Majesco Entertainment for the Wii and Xbox 360 platforms.GameplayHarley Pasternak's Hollywood Workout is a fitness game that uses Harley Pasternak's 5-Factor Fitness Program. On the Xbox 360 version of the game it uses the Kinect while the Wii version supports the Balance Board.
